page.title: 09SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: {ECCLESTON PARK TENNIS CLUB}.FOUNDED 1904.MEMBERSHIP-76 ADULTS,20 INTERMEDIATES,70 JUNIORS.FACILITIES-2 SHALE COURTS AND 2 HARD COURTS, {PRESCOT CRICKET CLUB.}FOUNDED 1854. 3 TEAMS.1'ST AND 2'ND TEAMS PLAY IN THE {MANCHESTER ASSOC., }3'RD TEAM PLAYS IN A LOCAL LEAGUE.THE CLUB POSSESSES 2 PITCHES.THERE ARE APPROX. 65 MEMBERS.IN ADDITION THERE IS A BOWLING SECTION WITH ABOUT 50 MEMBERS. {PRESCOT CABLES ASSOC.FOOTBALL CLUB.} FOUNDED 1884.GROUND IS IN HOPE ST.,PRESCOT.RECORD GATE 13000.F.A.CUP 6'TH ROUND ON 2 OCCASIONS.FORMER INTERNATIONALS {F.SOO.}& {J.CASE. {UGB.SPORTS CLUB,}BOBBY'S LANE,ECCLESTON.MEMBERSHIP RESTRICTED TO THE EMPLOYEES OF UGB. {RUGBY {LEAGUE,SOCCER,HOCKEY,CRICKET,TENNIS } AS WELL AS MANY INDOOR SPORTS. {
